name: WebKite
tag_list: content-management, data-management, search, content, community-building, decision-making, seo, search-engine-optimization, information-publishing, data, dynamic-text
overview:
WebKite transforms data into a dynamic, interactive, intuitive website.

Servicing businesses small and large, WebKite is able to take information and turn it into the flexible and customizable content management platform.WebKite is built on the foundation of tools that can help a business in four distinct areas: user empowerment, community building, website growth, and brand alignment.

The WebKite platform empowers users to educate their community with built-in decision tools such as multi-facet search and side-by-side comparisons. The WebKite platform comes equipped with community tools like built-in wikis, item ratings and reviews, social logins, and site feeds.

WebKite spurs website growth through inherent SEO. For instance, a WebKite site with 1,000 items and 10 user-saved lists creates over half a million unique pages ideal for long-tail search results.

Webkite is a fully functioning website that can be themed to match your existing site or can stand on its own. WebKite has been used in the marketplace to create a directory, product catalogue, vertical search engine, restaurant guide, and new content experiences.
